changeSet.sql: create sequence authorized_action_seq; create type eauthorizedactiontype as enum ('NEW_TOTP_SECRET', 'NEW_PASSWORD', 'NEW_EMAIL'); create table if not exists authorized_action ( id bigint not null constraint authorized_action_pkey primary key, auth_id bigint not null constraint authorized_action_on_auth references auth, data varchar(255), expiration timestamp, type eauthorizedactiontype, unique (type, auth_id) );
